help-file.title: "STORNOGS METAMAGIC SHROUD"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <victim> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Enchantment
The feared metamagic shroud binds itself to the victim, acting like a magnet for magical energies. This makes the victim much more susceptible to magical attacks.
